I want to feel the thrill of chasing a story again, to know that my work is making a difference. But I'm terrified that without these substances, I won't be brave enough, smart enough, or driven enough to uncover the truth. How can I investigate the biggest story of my career - the mystery of my own addiction - when I can't trust my own perceptions?
